channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Tailor of Panama
channel.desc: Andy, a MI6 agent, hires Harry, a tailor, living in Panama for espionage purposes. However, Harry's life is destroyed when he fabricates stories that unexpectedly take on a life of its own.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Green Hornet
channel.desc: After his father's death, Britt inherits the largest media company in Los Angeles. He teams up with Kato to fight crime but ends up becoming the target of a gangster, Benjamin Chudnofsky.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Mask of Zorro
channel.desc: Don De la Vega sets out as the Zorro to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. During his mission, he is aided by his successor, Alejandro, who also has his own agenda.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Donnie Brasco
channel.desc: While investigating a New York Mafia family from within, an FBI agent faces a moral quandary as he grows close to the organisation's feared hitman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.
